name: Cobbleshooter
description:
COBBLESHOOTER: Made in 3 days for Global Game Jam 21

(Theme: Lost and Found)

It would be highly appreciated if you could rate and leave feedback after playing.

A randomly generated Quake-Like FPS with lots of explosions.

The End goal is to destroy all the enemies in the skull marked rooms.

Controls:

LEFT MOUSE: Shoot rifle

RIGHT MOUSE: Shoot Shotgun

SHIFT: Dash while strafing

Change Log:
  • _export1 | Original submission
  • _export2 | Hopefully fixes the rare Navmesh errors preventing enemy spawns. And fixes to cursor lock and visiblity.
